patterns: What are the settings for the wireless internet
responses: The library wireless internet is open. This means that you do not need settings to access the wireless internet. Your browser picks the wireless automatically. However, if your laptop does not pick the wireless automatically, seek assistance from the library ICT Section.

patterns: How can I access the electronic journals in the library
responses: Google for JKUAT Library website. Click on the link to e-journals found on the menu bar. This takes you to an alphabetical list of databases of journals that are available for you.

patterns: Where do I get the codes and passwords for accessing the electronic journals
responses: You can obtain a list of the databases of journals and books that we subscribe to from the Library Photocopying unit at minimal photocopying charges. The list includes passwords and user names for the various databases. The list is also regularly circulated to everyone on the JKUAT email network. You can also email library@jkuat.ac.ke or digital.library@jkuat.ac.ke for the list.

patterns: How do I get access to a computer in the library computer laboratory?
responses: The library has a postgraduate and an undergraduate computer lab located on the ground floor. You are required to book for the use of the computers. Undergraduate students use a computer for a maximum of one (1) hr while the postgraduate students use the computers for a maximum of two (2) hrs

patterns: What are the qualifications for admission to JKUAT for International Students
responses: The qualifications for any International Student to join JKUAT varies depending on the course one intends to pursue in this prestigious university. We kindly request that you follow this link www.admission.jkuat.ac.ke

patterns: What is an Index Number in the Online Application Process
responses: When Asked to provide an Index Number during the JKUAT online application platform, Kindly fill in your High School Candidate Number or Examination number, In Kenya we call it Student Index Number, and proceed with your application.

patterns: What legal documents does one needs before studying in Kenya and where do I get them
Documents required to study in Kenya
responses: It is an offence to receive education or training at any educational or training establishment within Kenya without a pupils or students pass . Ensure you get a Police Clearance Certificate from your country before coming to Kenya for your pupils Pass Application.

patterns: Accommodation and Transport from the Airport
responses: If you are an exchange Staff or Student or a visiting staff and you need a short accommodation plan, you are advised to make a request to ALISO through your supervisor or host or hosting Department one month before the day of travel.

patterns: How does one get something announced during fellowships or Sunday Services
How do I make an announcement in service
responses: All announcements must be passed through the Secretary by text ,or otherwise via the JKUATCU phone number 0741852211. Sunday announcements should be passed to the secretary before 7 pm on Saturday and Wednesday announcements before 7 pm on Monday.

patterns: How does one get a clip played during the Wednesday Fellowship
How do I play a clip during fellowship
How do I play a video during fellowship
How do I play audio during fellowship
responses: Anyone or any department or group within JKUATCU who wants a clip played during the Wednesday Fellowship must pass it through either the Literature Secretary who must be notified at least one week in advance.

MD stands for Morning Devotion. It is a devotion that takes place every weekday from 5 am to 6 am. Those who stay within campus meet at the assembly hall blue seats and those who stay in hostels outside can either opt to join the rest at the assembly hall.

patterns: Where is the Power House located and what is it used for
What is the Power House used for
responses: The power house is located in the assembly hall adjascent to the stairs that lead to the balcony. It is used for prayers and many JKUATCU announcements are also posted there

patterns: How does one join a ministry in the union
How do I join a ministry in the union
responses: One can join a ministry by contacting the ministry through their page on this site or contacting the leader of the ministry.

patterns: How do i activate my student email
How do I access my student email
responses: Google the JKUAT website. Under highlights ,next to the slideshow, select 'Activate Your Student Email'. Enter your registration number then submit. Proceed to follow the instructions given to activate

patterns: How do I reset my portal password
responses: To reset your password, visit IEET.
